documentation.text:
@notice Sets the owner of the contract
 @param _newOwner the owner of the contract.

attributes.text:
@notice Sets the owner of the contract
 @param _newOwner the owner of the contract.

devdoc.author: Fabian Vogelsteller <fabian@lukso.network>
devdoc.details: Bundles ERC725X and ERC725Y, and ERC1271 and allows receiving native tokens.

params._data: the call data, or the contract data to deploy
params._operation: the operation to execute: CALL = 0; DELEGATECALL = 1; CREATE2 = 2; CREATE = 3;
params._to: the smart contract or address to interact with. `_to` will be unused if a contract is created (operation 2 and 3)
params._value: the value of ETH to transfer

params._key: the key which value to retrieve

returns._value: The date stored at the key

params._hash: hash of the data signed//Arbitrary length data signed on the behalf of address(this)

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._key: the key which value to retrieve

supportsInterface(bytes4).details: See {IERC165-supportsInterface}. Time complexity O(1), guaranteed to always use less than 30 000 gas.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: ERC725Account

methods.constructor: Sets the owner of the contract

execute(uint256,address,uint256,bytes).notice: Executes any other smart contract. Is only callable by the owner.

isValidSignature(bytes32,bytes).notice: Checks if an owner signed `_data`. ERC1271 interface.
